draw3

类 PenModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • draw3.PenModel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PenModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class PenModel is used to save all the model data, including the pen's size, color, position and the actual as well as the guessing words
    作者:
    Kross
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
